languages.text: "Гален был хорошим исполнителем, но, увы, он также был и трусом. В последний момент перед появлением внушающ{mf|его|ей} страх Вольного Торговца он был готов раскаяться и во всем признаться. Я предложила ему сначала попросить прощения у Императора... и тот даровал ему свое милосердие, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Гален был хорошим исполнителем, но, увы, также он был никчемным трусом. В последний момент перед появлением внушающ{mf|его|ей} страх Вольного Торговца он был готов раскаяться и во всем признаться. Я предложила ему сначала попросить прощения у Императора... красивая смерть получилась, правда?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"
languages.original_text: "Гален был хорошим исполнителем, но, увы, он также был и трусом. В последний момент перед появлением внушающ{mf|его|ей} страх Вольного Торговца он был готов раскаяться и во всем признаться. Я предложила ему сначала попросить прощения у Императора... и тот даровал ему свое милосердие, не правда ли?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen had been a good agent, but he also had been a coward. At the last moment before the imposing Rogue Trader would appear, he was ready to confess everything. I suggested him to ask for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did not he?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Halen had been a good agent, but he also had been a coward. At the last moment before the imposing Rogue Trader would appear, he was ready to confess everything. I suggested him to ask for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did not he?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. At the last moment before the imposing Rogue Trader appeared, he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, didn't he?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. At the last moment before the imposing Rogue Trader appeared, he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, didn't he?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

traits.locale_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: 「ヘイレンは優秀なスパイだったけど、臆病者でもあった。自由開拓者を呼び出すという瀬戸際になって、すべてを白状しようとしたのよ。まずは皇帝に許しを乞うようヘイレンに促したわ…確かに慈悲を与えてくださったでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイレンは優秀なスパイだったけど、臆病者でもあった。自由開拓者を呼び出すという瀬戸際になって、すべてを白状しようとしたのよ。まずは皇帝に許しを乞うようヘイレンに促したわ…確かに慈悲を与えてくださったでしょう？」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: “哈伦是枚好棋子，但也是个贪生怕死的懦夫。受人敬畏的行商浪人大驾光临前的最后一刻，他居然跑到我这里，说打算向你坦白一切。我建议他应该先去祈求神皇的宽恕……神皇也确实降下了祂的恩典，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: “哈伦是枚好棋子，但也是个贪生怕死的懦夫。受人敬畏的行商浪人大驾光临前的最后一刻，他居然跑到我这里，说打算向你坦白一切。我建议他应该先去祈求神皇的宽恕……神皇也确实降下了祂的恩典，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: « Si Halen était un bon agent, il n'en était pas moins un lâche. Il est venu me voir juste avant l'arrivée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et s'est dit prêt à tout avouer, alors je lui ai suggéré de commencer par implorer le pardon de l'Empereur... et d'une certaine manière, il a été exaucé. »
languages.original_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: « Si Halen était un bon agent, il n'en était pas moins un lâche. Il est venu me voir juste avant l'arrivée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et s'est dit prêt à tout avouer, alors je lui ai suggéré de commencer par implorer le pardon de l'Empereur... et d'une certaine manière, il a été exaucé. »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: «Halen era tan buen agente como cobarde. Vino a mí justo antes de la llegada de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Estaba dispuesto a confesarlo todo. Le sugerí que antes de todo suplicara el perdón del Emperador... y la verdad es que este le concedió misericordia, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: «Halen era tan buen agente como cobarde. Vino a mí justo antes de la llegada de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Estaba dispuesto a confesarlo todo. Le sugerí que antes de todo suplicara el perdón del Emperador... y la verdad es que este le concedió misericordia, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Halen war ein guter Agent, aber er war auch ein Feigling. Er kam unmittelbar vor der Ankunft {mf|unseres wackeren Freihändlers|unserer wackeren Freihändlerin} zu mir ... und war bereit, alles zu gestehen. Ich riet ihm, zunächst den Imperator um Vergebung zu bitten ... und er hat ihm Gnade gewährt, oder nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen war ein guter Agent, aber er war auch ein Feigling. Im letzten Augenblick vor dem Erscheinen {mf|des imposanten Freihändlers|der imposanten Freihändlerin} war er bereit, alles zu gestehen. Ich habe vorgeschlagen, dass er zunächst den Imperator um Vergebung bittet ... und er hat ihm Gnade gewährt, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: "Halen, iyi bir maşa olduğu kadar ödlekti de. Muhterem Hür Tacirimiz gelmeden evvel benimle görüştü. Her şeyi itiraf etmeye hazırdı. Önce İmparator'a dua edip af dilenmesini tavsiye ettim... O da merhametini gösterdi işte, öyle değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Halen was a good agent, but he was also a coward. He came to me just before our formidable Rogue Trader arrived — he was ready to confess everything. I suggested that he plead for the Emperor's forgiveness first... and He did grant him mercy, did He not?"

traits.locale_text: "Halen iyi bir maşaydı ama bir o kadar da ödlekti. Muhterem Hür Tacirimiz gelmeden önce benimle görüştü. Her şeyi itiraf etmeye hazırdı. Önce İmparator'a dua edip af dilenmesini tavsiye ettim... O da merhametini gösterdi işte, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
